duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in providing direct patient care as delegated by the Registered Nurse within the scope of the NAR licensure.

Perform basic technical skills including CPR, vital signs recording, measuring and recording fluid intake/output, applying dressings, recognizing and reporting signs and symptoms of common diseases or conditions, and administering treatments as directed.
Assist patient with personal care such as bathing, care, grooming, toileting assistance, and eating and hydration.
Provide patients with help walking, exercising, and moving in and out of bed.
Document relevant patient care data and provide clerical support to the unit.
Graduate of an approved Certified Nursing Assistant program and possess current Nursing Assistant Registered certification and BLS certification.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an approved Certified Nursing Assistant program and possess current Nursing Assistant Registered certification and BLS certification.
